objects.specification: A large flat booth floor panel with a smooth metallic finish in a neutral brand color, covering approximately ten by ten meters, featuring a subtle reflective sheen and clean edges for a professional exhibition space.

An enclosed booth wall constructed from lightweight panels standing three meters high, featuring a sleek metallic finish and brand-color accents, with a central entrance opening approximately two meters wide for visitor access.

An enclosed booth wall constructed from lightweight panels standing three meters high, featuring a sleek metallic finish and brand-color accents, with an uninterrupted solid surface for mounting displays and branding.

An enclosed booth wall constructed from lightweight panels standing three meters high, featuring a sleek metallic finish and brand-color accents, with an uninterrupted solid surface for mounting displays and branding.

An enclosed booth wall constructed from lightweight panels standing three meters high, featuring a sleek metallic finish and brand-color accents, with an uninterrupted solid surface for mounting displays and branding.

A realistic demo car model in a modern metallic finish, scaled to approximately 4.5 meters in length and 2 meters in width, featuring detailed bodywork with smooth curves, realistic glass windows, visible tires with tread detail, and brand-logo accents on the hood and sides.

A rectangular reception desk with a modern design, measuring approximately two meters wide and one meter deep, featuring a clean white tabletop with metallic support legs, subtle brand-color trim along the edges, and a smooth finish for visitor interaction.

A vertical rectangular display stand measuring around 1.5 meters tall and one meter wide, with a slim metallic frame, flat display surface for informational panels or screens, and subtle branding at the top edge.

A vertical rectangular display stand measuring around 1.5 meters tall and one meter wide, with a slim metallic frame, flat display surface for informational panels or screens, and subtle branding at the top edge.

A vertical rectangular display stand measuring around 1.5 meters tall and one meter wide, with a slim metallic frame, flat display surface for informational panels or screens, and subtle branding at the top edge.

A visitor seating area consisting of a small round table approximately 0.8 meters in diameter with a sleek metallic pedestal base, surrounded by four modern chairs with curved backrests and cushioned seats in a neutral color palette with consistent brand-color highlights.

A visitor seating area consisting of a small round table approximately 0.8 meters in diameter with a sleek metallic pedestal base, surrounded by four modern chairs with curved backrests and cushioned seats in a neutral color palette with consistent brand-color highlights.

An overhead linear lighting fixture in the form of a horizontal bar approximately two meters long, featuring bright LED elements in a cool white tone, with a slim metallic housing and diffused cover for even illumination across the booth area.

An overhead linear lighting fixture in the form of a horizontal bar approximately two meters long, featuring bright LED elements in a cool white tone, with a slim metallic housing and diffused cover for even illumination across the booth area.

A vertical hanging banner approximately 1.5 meters tall, made from lightweight fabric with the brand logo and color scheme printed in high resolution, featuring reinforced top and bottom bars and grommets for attachment to the booth frame.

A framed informational poster sized roughly one meter by 1.5 meters, with high-resolution automotive-themed graphics and text, mounted on the wall with a slim metallic frame and matte finish to reduce glare.
